entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
